member.name: T:VMotion.VMotion

member.param: Required: Name of the virtual machine
Required: Name of the target host
Required: Name of the host containg the virtual machine
Required: Name of the target resource pool
Required: Name of the target datastore
Optional: The priority of the migration task: defaultPriority, highPriority, lowPriority
